title: E82 Everyone's Ghostly Step Dad and a Tattoo of Frosted Tips
description:
You've CAT to be KITTEN me. It's our 101st episode (including listener eps) and we celebrated with Moon Pie, cream soda and holy water-themed gifts! This week Em revisits the Lizzie Borden House to tell the paranormal side of the story and Christine dives into the tragic disappearance of Amy Lynn Bradley from Royal Caribbean Cruise Lines. Also, everyone gets a horoscope this week, including the newly termed "Spicy Pisces," and Gio learns that his healing comes from within...and that's why we drink, folks!
Visit www.tryfirstleaf.com/drink to get your introductory three-pack of wines for only $15! 
Dial **401 for a FREE trial membership of Beach Body on Demand!
Skillshare is giving listeners two months of unlimited access to over 20,000 classes for just 99 cents. Go to www.skillshare.com/drink to start your two months now!
Get 20% off your purchase at wanderbeauty.com/drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
